author: JumpingYang001
body: @andschwa @JamesWTruher @lzybkr , can you help to review this PR? thank you!

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@JumpingYang001**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution!

It looks like you're a Microsoft contributor (Jumping Yang (Wicresoft)). If you're full-time, we DON'T require a Contribution License Agreement. If you are a vendor, please DO sign the electronic Contribution License Agreement. It will take 2 minutes and there's no faxing! https://cla.microsoft.com.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
**@JumpingYang001**, Thanks for signing the contribution license agreement so quickly! Actual humans will now validate the agreement and then evaluate the PR.
Thanks, MSBOT;

comments.author: JumpingYang001
comments.body: @JamesWTruher , I have fixed the comments and rebase upstream/master, could you help to merge this to upstream/master? thank you!

title: Add BooleanParameterDCR and Eventing Pester Test
